title: Crimson Leaves of Immortality: Bonsai View from the Moon Gate
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, ultra-detailed illustration, A stunningly beautiful and ancient bonsai tree with vibrant crimson and orange autumn leaves, sitting in an ornate teal ceramic pot featuring dragon relief, placed on a dark, intricately carved wooden shelf. The scene is framed by a traditional Chinese circular window (Moon Gate). Outside the window, a breathtaking panorama of misty karst mountains, towering peaks, cascading waterfalls, and traditional layered Chinese pavilions submerged in a valley of auspicious white and pink clouds (Qingyun). Soft golden hour lighting (sunset/sunrise), ethereal atmosphere, cinematic composition, Zhongguo Feng, Donghua Chinese style, 16:9 aspect ratio.
